page.title: 15LOCKLEAZE SCHOOL.
page.content: {LOCKLEAZE SCHOOL}HAS TWO MAIN ENTRANCES WHICH ARE FROM ROMNEY AVE. AND HOGARTH WLK. THEY HAVE FIVE BUILDINGS WHICH ARE: LOWER SCHOOL, MIDDLE SCHOOL, UPPER SCHOOL,SWIMMING POOL AND SPORTS HALL. THERE IS ALSO A COMMUNITY ROOM FOR MEETINGS OF ORGANIZATIONS IN THE AREA BUT NOT TO DO WITH THE SCHOOL. THE SCHOOL HAS 900 PUPILS. THE AGE RANGE IS FROM 11 TO 18. THERE ARE ABOUT 60 STAFF MEMBERS. A VERY WIDE RANGE OF SUBJECTS IS OFFERED. THE MOST POPULAR SUBJECT IS FRENCH. THERE ARE 6 LESSONS A DAY, EACH LASTING ONE HOUR. EVERY DAY THERE ARE AFTER-SCHOOL ACTIVITIES. MANY SPORTS ARE AVAILABLE TO PUPILS IN AND OUT OF SCHOOL. PUPILS GO TO THE LIBRARY TO READ AND TO DO HOMEWORK. SOMETIMES LESSONS ARE HELD THERE. PUPILS MAY SIT C.S.E.,'O' LEVEL AND 'A'LEVEL EXAMINATIONS.
